body.p: The tasks are defined by 2 things :

ul.li: Tasks : task are great definition with name, activation, communication...
Actions : defined in a task, theses actions are designed to make wakeonlan, inventory, netdiscovery... on agents. You can have many actions on one task.

body.p: These tasks are used to order to agents what to do. They can be scheduled and have periodicity parameter to run for example every hour.
